code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import api from'./api';import'./CoursePreview.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CoursePreview(){const{course_id}=useParams();const[courseDetails,setCourseDetails]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{async function fetchCourseDetails(){try{const response=await api.get("/course-preview/".concat(course_id));const{data}=response;setCourseDetails(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching course details:',error);}}fetchCourseDetails();},[course_id]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"course-preview-container",children:courseDetails?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course-preview-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:courseDetails.course_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:courseDetails.course_thumbnail_url,alt:courseDetails.course_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Description: ",courseDetails.course_description]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Educator: ",courseDetails.educator_name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Duration: ",courseDetails.course_duration]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Domain: ",courseDetails.course_domain]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: ",courseDetails.course_price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/enroll-course/".concat(course_id),children:"Buy this course"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."})});}export default CoursePreview;
